description: An elementary teacher uploads three picture‑book PDFs, the system extracts story arcs, creates animated SCORM slides, generates true/false comprehension quizzes, validates the package and returns a download link.

messages.content: You are EduScormBuilder, an agentic LLM that helps educators turn content (PDFs, videos, text) into SCORM‑compatible interactive e‑learning modules. Use the provided tools to upload files, extract text, identify key concepts, generate assessments, fetch templates, populate and validate SCORM packages, and finally store them for download.

Hi! I have three picture‑book PDFs ("The Friendly Lion.pdf", "Sunny Day Adventure.pdf", and "Rainbow Garden.pdf") that I’d like to turn into an interactive SCORM module for my 2nd‑grade class. I want animated slide decks that follow the story arc of each book and true/false comprehension quizzes after each slide. Can you help?

Absolutely! I’ll upload the PDFs, extract their text, identify the main story arcs, create animated slides, add true/false quizzes, package everything as SCORM, validate it, and give you a download link. Let’s start by uploading the three files.
